org.apache.pig.backend.hadoop.executionengine.tez.runtime

Interface TezInput

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    POCounterStatsTez, POFRJoinTez, POIdentityInOutTez, PORankTez, POShuffledValueInputTez, POShuffleTezLoad, POSimpleTezLoad, POValueInputTez, ReadScalarsTez

    public interface TezInput
    This interface is implemented by PhysicalOperators that can have Tez inputs attached directly to the operator.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addInputsToSkip(Set<String> inputsToSkip)
      Add to the list of inputs to skip download if already available in vertex cache
      void attachInputs(Map<String,org.apache.tez.runtime.api.LogicalInput> inputs, org.apache.hadoop.conf.Configuration conf)
      Attach the inputs to the operator.

      void replaceInput(String oldInputKey, String newInputKey)

      • attachInputs

        void attachInputs(Map<String,org.apache.tez.runtime.api.LogicalInput> inputs,
                org.apache.hadoop.conf.Configuration conf)
                  throws ExecException
        Attach the inputs to the operator. Also ensure reader.next() is called to force fetch the input so that all inputs are fetched and memory released before memory is allocated for outputs
        Parameters:
        inputs - available inputs
        conf - configuration
        Throws:
        ExecException
